description: The Scottish airline has been operating the service on behalf of British Airways since 2018.
title: Loganair to operate Isle of Man flights to London City
title_page: Loganair to operate Isle of Man flights to London City - BBC News
maintext: A Loganair spokesman said that tickets bought for any services next month will not be carried over and any passengers scheduled to fly in September will need to purchase another seat and seek a refund from British Airways.
